Coffee.title: Cappuccino
Coffee.desc: A cappuccino is a coffee-based drink made primarily from espresso and milk

Coffee.title: Iced Cappuccino
Coffee.desc: An iced cappuccino is a coffee drink with espresso, milk, ice, and optional sweetener.

Coffee.title: Mocha Cappuccino
Coffee.desc: A mocha cappuccino is another name for a mocha or mocha latte: a drink made with espresso, steamed milk and chocolate.
